input: write μ: sum all numbers in list
write μ: find max in array
write μ: count even numbers in list
write μ: reverse a list
write μ: check if all elements are positive
write μ: compute factorial of n
write μ: check for palindrome string
write μ: find minimum in array
write μ: sort a list ascending
write μ: count occurrences of value v in list
write μ: merge two sorted arrays
output:
i←0,j←0,merged←∅
⊃i<len(a)∧j<len(b): ⊃a[i]<b[j]: merged←merged+[a[i]]; i←i+1 
¬merged←merged+[b[j]]; j←j+1
∀k∈[i..len(a)-1]: merged←merged+[a[k]]
∀k∈[j..len(b)-1]: merged←merged+[b[k]]
→δ:merged

l←0; h←len(arr)-1
while l<=h: m←(l+h)//2
⊃arr[m]=v: →δ:m
⊃arr[m]<v: l←m+1
¬h←m-1
→δ:∅
